item.name: 一つ前のウィンドウへ移動
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, VK_CONTROL | VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::C, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::END, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL

item.appendix: このセクションはTerminal.appが対象
修飾キーの多いものから順番に書く必要がある

item.name: 前のレイアウトへ切り替える
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, VK_COMMAND | VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::D, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 次のレイアウトへ切り替える
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, VK_COMMAND | VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::E, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 前のウィンドウへ切り替える
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::B, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 次のウィンドウへ切り替える
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::C, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 前のウィンドウへフォーカスを移す
item.appendix: [(command C S t)] -> [(C z) (C a) (C f)]
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, VK_COMMAND | VK_CONTROL | VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::F, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 次のウィンドウへフォーカスを移す
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, VK_COMMAND | VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::G, VK_CONTROL

item.name: 新しいレイアウトを開く
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::Z, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::H, VK_CONTROL
